content:
/>
V.iii.4.A.1.h
.
DLCO Testing
When utilizing DLCO to evaluate a respiratory disability, only test results recognized as DLCO or DLCO by the single breath method (DLCO (SB)) will be utilized for rating purposes.
DLCO divided by alveolar volume (DLCO/VA) is a variant of DLCO (SB) in which the DLCO is divided by the alveolar volume of the lungs. There is no provision for considering DLCO/VA under
38 CFR 4.96
or
38 CFR 4.97
. Consequently, DLCO/VA cannot be utilized for rating purposes.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section A - Respiratory Conditions
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section A
